entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is described as the one who took up his position in the middle of the classroom and gripped the box lid. He is also the one who pulled off the lid to open the box.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the student who was trying hard to fill his head with happy thoughts about Gryffindor winning and not dark thoughts about what was going to happen when the box opened. He is also the one who yelled 'Expecto patronum!'

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Harry hopes will win.

entities.name: dementor
entities.description: The dementor is described as a creature that glided forward and drew its breath. It was extending its rotting hand towards Harry.

relationships.description: Lupin is helping Harry by tapping him hard on the face to wake him up.
The dementor is threatening Harry by extending its rotting hand towards him.
